## LinkExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>


## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [activationHandler()](./core-extensions.linkextensionoptions.activationhandler.md) | Return true to intercept the activation. This is useful for showing a dialog to replace the selected text. |
